ResourceHeader.Description:
Middle Tennessee State University is a
   participant in the Radio JOVE project providing observations of
   radio emissions from Jupiter, the Sun, and the Galactic Background
   to other members of the Radio JOVE community. The observatory
   consists of a TFD (Terminated Folded Dipole) array and a JOVE dipole array.

   The JOVE receiver is fed the output from the JOVE dipole array, the
   FSX 6S 12-bit switching dual polarization spectrograph receives the
   TFD array.

InformationURL.Name: Radio JOVE Spectrograph Users Group (SUG)
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the Radio JOVE project
